content:
I advertised this nice book, which has a lot of category theory in it:

https://twitter.com/johncarlosbaez/status/1409213172494475264

I got my copy of this book! It explains a lot of modern math connected to new concepts of space: diffeologies, synthetic differential geometry, topos theory, infinity-groupoids, homotopy type theory, stacks, derived geometry and differential graded categories. (1/n) https://twitter.com/johncarlosbaez/status/1409213172494475264/photo/1

- John Carlos Baez (@johncarlosbaez)
